summary: Items in ItemizedOverlay should not be rotated when map is rotated

comments.content: What steps will reproduce the problem? 1. Use an ItemizedOverlay, for example like in SampleWithMinimapItemizedoverlayWithFocus 2. Call setMapOrientation on MapView What is the expected output? What do you see instead? I expect the map to be rotated with the items in the correct position but still aligned with the top facing up. What actually happens is that the items are also rotated.
Attached is a piece of code to demonstrate the bug.
I have already fixed it in the branch for issue 478 in revision 1346, but this needs to be done in trunk.
We should also do this with the MyLocationNewOverlay for the "little man" icon. I will probably do this today.
Updated in r1350. Rotate the "little man" so he is always facing up.
Change in branch v2 merged into trunk in revision 1359.
